scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev:3000: npm run build && npm run serve:3000
scripts.dev:8080: npm run build && npm run serve:8080
scripts.kill-server: pkill -f 'python3 -m http.server' || echo 'No server processes found'
scripts.clean-server: npm run kill-server && sleep 2 && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Port 8000 cleaned'
scripts.start-server: npm run clean-server && npm run dev
scripts.server-status: lsof -i :8000 2>/dev/null && echo 'âœ… Server is running on port 8000' || echo 'âŒ No server running on port 8000'
scripts.force-clean: echo 'ðŸ”§ Force cleaning all related processes...' && pkill -9 -f 'python3 -m http.server' 2>/dev/null; pkill -9 -f 'node.*dev' 2>/dev/null; pkill -9 -f 'npm.*dev' 2>/dev/null; sleep 3; echo 'âœ… Cleanup complete'
scripts.reset: echo 'ðŸ”„ Full system reset...' && npm run force-clean && sleep 2 && npm run build && echo 'âœ… System reset complete. Run "npm run start-server" to start fresh.'
